S.FORM: Mauritania Gaga kska Meycow ka Mauritania, 20 00 N, 12 00 W ka gaga na nniqan. Kana ka knlbangan na o 1,030,700 sq km(hangan na o Tg29) (knlbanga dxgal o 1,030,700 sq km, knlbangan qsiya o 0 sq km). Kana ka sejiqun o niqan 3,677,293 hiyi. Gaga Nouakchott ka pusu alang paru, jiyax 28 idas 11 ka jiyax skrayan klwaan. Manu ka dxgal Mauritania ga wada sugan 38.50 ka dxgal qpahan, 0.20 ka dxgal bbuyu, rahuq dxgal do niqan 61.30 na. Bukung klwaan ta sayang o kiya ka Mohamed Ould Abdel Aziz, pnaah hngkawas2009 idas 8 jiyax 5pnrajing kmlawa klwaan.
